18 class Mq_attr {
19  friend class Mq;
20 public:
21  Mq_attr(){ memset(&attr_, 0, sizeof(attr_)); };
22  Mq_attr(long f, long m, long s){
23  attr_.mq_flags = f;
24  attr_.mq_curmsgs = 0;
25  attr_.mq_maxmsg = m;
26  attr_.mq_msgsize = s;
27  }
28 
30  enum flags {
31  NONBLOCK = O_NONBLOCK,
32  RDWR = O_RDWR,
33  READWRITE = O_RDWR,
34  RDONLY = O_RDONLY,
35  READONLY = O_RDONLY
36  };
37 
38  inline long flags() const { return attr_.mq_flags; }
39  inline long curmsgs() const { return attr_.mq_curmsgs; }
40  inline long maxmsg() const { return attr_.mq_maxmsg; }
41  inline long msgsize() const { return attr_.mq_msgsize; }
42 
43  inline void setflags(long v) { attr_.mq_flags = v; }
44  inline void setcurmsgs(long v) { attr_.mq_curmsgs = v; }
45  inline void setmaxmsg(long v) { attr_.mq_maxmsg = v; }
46  inline void setmsgsize(long v) { attr_.mq_msgsize = v; }
47 
48 private:
49  struct mq_attr attr_;
50 };
